current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To require the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to conduct outreach to veterans regarding the effect
			 of
			 certain delayed payments by the Secretary, to require
			 the Secretary to submit to Congress an annual report regarding such
			 delayed payments, and for other purposes.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text: Outreach to veterans regarding effect of delayed payments by Veterans Integrated Service Networks

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall conduct outreach, including through national and local
			 veterans service organizations, to inform veterans of how to resolve
			 credit issues caused by a delayed payment.

text.#text: The

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall establish a
			 toll-free telephone number for veterans to report credit issues described
			 in

to

text.#text: The

a report on
			 the effectiveness
			 of each Veterans Integrated Service Network in providing timely payment of
			 a proper invoice by the required payment date during both the five-year
			 period preceding the date of the report and the one-year period preceding
			 such date.

text.#text:
Not later than one year after the date of the enactment of this Act, and not less frequently than
			 annually thereafter, the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:

			 following:

regarding a delayed payment that negatively
			 affected, or will potentially negatively affect, the credit of the

The number of proper invoices submitted, listed in a table for each quarter and fiscal year of

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: under the proper invoices.

text.#text: The total amount owed by the
The payment status of each proper invoice, as of the date of the report.

The period that elapsed until each proper invoice was paid, including an explanation of any delayed

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: has received and considers relevant.

Such comments made by medical providers regarding delayed payments to such medical providers that

An identification of the Veterans Integrated Service Network with the least number of delayed

A description of the best practices that a Veterans Integrated Service Network can carry out to
			 provide timely payment of a proper invoice, including a plan for
			 underperforming Veterans Integrated Service Networks to improve such
			 timely payments.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall conduct a study that assesses the effectiveness
			 of each Veterans Integrated Service Network in providing timely payment of
			 a proper invoice by the required payment date.
